inputs.name: Email addresses
inputs.help_text: Enter email addresses separated by semicolon.

inputs.name: Email Schedule
inputs.help_text: Select the interval to generate and send report email notifications.

inputs.name: Generate Full Report
inputs.help_text: Select to generate and send a complete report every time.

inputs.name: Save Changes
inputs.help_text: Click to save the changes made in the configuration.

inputs.name: Reset
inputs.help_text: Click to reset the configuration settings.

inputs.name: Test Settings
inputs.help_text: Click to test the email notification settings.

actions.description: Generates and sends report emails based on the configured schedule and settings.
Generates a complete report instead of incremental changes when the checkbox is selected.

constraints.description: Email addresses must be valid and separated by semicolons.
Only one schedule option (daily, weekly, monthly) can be selected at a time.

errors.description: Occurs when the entered email addresses are not in a valid format.
errors.resolution: Ensure all email addresses are valid and separated by semicolons.

errors.description: Occurs when no schedule is selected for email notifications.
errors.resolution: Select a schedule option (daily, weekly, or monthly).

steps: Navigate to System > Configuration > Notification > Email Notification.
Enter email addresses separated by semicolon.
Select the interval for email notifications (daily, weekly, or monthly).
Optionally, select Generate Full Report to send complete reports.
Click Save Changes to apply the configuration.
